          <title>
            <string language="de">Infoblatt "Tropenholz"</string>
            <string language="en">Infosheet "Tropical Wood"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Infosheet "Bois Tropical"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Infosheet "Madeira Tropical"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Infosheet "Legno Tropicale"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Infosheet "τροπικό ξύλο"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Infosheet "Madera Tropical"</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Auflistung von Tropenhölzern und einheimischen Hölzern. Zusammenstellung der Prinzipien und Kriterien des Forest Stewardship Council (FSC). Regenwaldschutz-Tipps von Robin Wood.</string>
            <string language="en">Listing of tropical and native woods. Compilation of principles and criteria of the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC). Advice on the protection of rain forest from Robin Wood.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="de">Tropen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Wood</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Tropical wood</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>

            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liste des bois tropicaux et indigènes. 
Compilation des principes et critères du Conseil d'intendance
de forêt (FSC). Conseil sur la protection de la forêt 
tropicale contre le bois de merle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lista de madeiras tropicais e nativas. 
Compilação dos princípios e critérios do conselho do 
stewardship da floresta (FSC). Conselho na proteção da 
floresta de chuva da madeira do robin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elenco dei legno tropicali e natali. 
Compilazione dei principii e test di verifica del Consiglio di 
stewardship della foresta (FSC). Consiglio sulla protezione 
della foresta di pioggia dal legno del pettirosso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λίστα των τροπικών και εγγενών ξύλων. 
Μεταγλώττιση των αρχών και κριτήρια του δασικού Συμβουλίου 
διαχείρισης (FSC). Συμβουλές για την προστασία του 
τροπικού δάσους από το Robin Wood.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Listado de maderas tropicales y nativas. 
Compilación de principios y criterios del consejo de la 
administración del bosque (FSC). Consejo sobre la protección 
de la selva tropical contra la madera del robin.</string>
          </description>
